title: Mac Launcher crashes after pressing play. Any ideas?? HELP
body: Basically whenever I press play in the launcher the game just crashes. I don't have any idea why. The game worked last night, so it has to have something to do with the patch. Anyone have any ideas? Help me please.

replies.body: The game is still not working for me, it's been about two hours. I guess the worst part about it is that Riot isn't even acknowledging that this is a problem. Has anyone seen Riot respond to any complaints of this?

Hey djenjoyspie2, and everyone else!

Sorry for not responding to all of you earlier! I recently posted an update about an issue facing Mac Users with the latest patch, which you can find here:

http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/support/eHL23EKr-crashes-on-opening-the-game?comment=000700000000000000000001

I'm sorry I am not able to provide more direct support at this time, however. :( Rest assured this is something we are actively investigating so that we can get it fixed asap!

SO no one has found a solution to this problem yet? It started with this new patch that they came out with, also i keep having game loading issues with the old patches too. I kept getting bug spat after every match. My loading time went way down as well. I was always the first to load and this 3.10 patch cam out and it took for ever to load into a game. If anyone has any ideas please let us know.
Ditto, I'm glad im not the only one having this problem but im sad because my whole life is based around this game. I find it quite frustrating. THEE anger Sharks are SWIMMING in My HEAD!!!!!!!!
Same here, you press "play" ... it goes away! Started after the patch.
Patched and it's FIXED!!!! Thank you Riot.
TIP: I suggest NOT trying to Repair Client because it erased ALL my item sets. :( -- Found out the hard way. Hope this gets fixed soon.
It opens when you try it like the 10th time or more. When you get invited to a team game, you can't see what they chat nor their IGNs. Hope Riot will fix it soon.
Still not working for me, and I tried the quick fix suggested but it didn't work either... hope this gets fixed soon
The problem still exists. >< I seriously am not going to reinstall the entire game again.

I've never even posted her before and logged on just to say I'm having the same issue.. Must be the patch. BUT after opening and opening it at least 15 times it finally loaded.. It's almost like it missed a piece of the patch because it updated something just now (update bars popped up but no text). Just played a game and it was fine.
Good luck!
Still not working for me either.
still no word on whats happening.... impressive

Same issue here as well.  But if I span play eventually I get into, and I tried to login and it prompts me for a "name summoner"  WTF Where is my summoner?  I tried entering the summoner name I already have and it said it was already taken.  So I entered a new one, thinking maybe they just needed me to rename it (the my summoner name as kinda gross).  I did, and Its a brand new summoner...How do i get my summoner back with my lvls, champions and IP/RP???!?
If you use chrome, try running LOL without chrome open at all. You can hit command+option+escape to open a force quit window if you are not sure that you closed chrome properly or not.
Same thing happening to me as well.
Same here, I even tried to restall it but it keeps hapening
They fixed it now with another 78 kb update
As of 8:22 Eastern GMT there has been an update. Still doesn't work...
Same problem. Even been spamming open>play and just can't catch a strike of luck. Trying to spread it over the forums in hopes Riot notices there is a legitimate issue here.

Same issue on all sides it seems... The only thing that I've found to truly work is to use the 'change region' button below the server status and then change to any region besides NA then change back. However, this is only a ONE TIME fix and takes 10-20 minutes to finish the 'update' it has.
yeah still not working for me either when will riot fix this?
scratch that i just went with the try over and over again method and it worked after about 10 times so just do that and im sure riot will fix it
I have the same issue as well. My client has worked since its release very well, so i hope they get this issue fixed soon
Im having the same problem.
Having the same issue after update about 20 mins ago. :(
This has prevented me from using PBE for the past while now, and now it is on the live client. As much as this sucks, I think my marks may rise a bit for school until this gets sorted out.
I had same issue earlier today, I just kept trying it over and over and over again and it eventually worked..  All the advice I have.  Reinstalling wont help.
Yeah I'm having that same problem. Tried repair instillation and re-installing neither work.
Yeah i have the same problem but i think if you re-instal league it might work but i have not tried it yet. so you might want to give that a try.

Update your post after you reinstall league. I am aware of someone else who has done this and it did not work. 
It takes me a while to re install

Yeah i am informed that it does not work as well and i can say that it does not work XD
hopefully Riot finds a quick solution to the problem . but ill inform you guys if i find something that works.
I have this problem as well and now I'm playing a game made by another company. Not my ideal world.
Yep same problem spamming seems to be only solution, but at least it works. I really hope they fix this in next patch.

Kind of a solution:

I have the same problem, but if I keep spamming the application open it usually works on like the 5th  or 6th try. Not really a solution to the problem, but at least it will let me play. Hope this helps
Maybe the 10th time lol!
I am having the same problems.  It really sucks. :/
